item.name: Alabaster Dragon
item.text: Flying When Alabaster Dragon is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, shuffle Alabaster Dragon into its owner's library.

item.name: Alluring Scent
item.text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
item.flavorText: Doom rarely smells this sweet.

item.name: Anaconda
item.text: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
item.flavorText: Something soft bumped against the rowboat, then was gone.

item.name: Anaconda
item.text: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
item.flavorText: Something soft bumped against the rowboat, then was gone.

item.name: Ancestral Memories
item.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

item.name: Angelic Blessing
item.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: A peasant can do more by faith than a king by proclamation.

item.name: Archangel
item.text: Flying, vigilance

item.name: Ardent Militia
item.text: Vigilance
item.flavorText: Some fight for honor and some for gold, but the militia fights for hearth and home.

item.name: Armageddon
item.text: Destroy all lands.
item.flavorText: "‘O miserable of happy Is this the end Of this new glorious world . . . ?'" —John Milton, Paradise Lost

item.name: Armored Pegasus
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

item.name: Arrogant Vampire
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Charm and grace may hide a foul heart.

item.name: Assassin's Blade
item.text: Cast Assassin's Blade only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Destroy target nonblack attacking creature.

item.name: Balance of Power
item.text: If target opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

item.name: Baleful Stare
item.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Mountain and red card in it.

item.name: Bee Sting
item.text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: There are few things as motivating as a swarm of bees.

item.name: Blaze
item.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Blaze
item.text: Blaze deals X damage to target creature or player.

item.name: Blessed Reversal
item.text: You gain 3 life for each creature attacking you.

item.name: Blinding Light
item.text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.
item.flavorText: Let the unjust avert their faces and contemplate their peril.

item.name: Bog Imp
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

item.name: Bog Raiders
item.text: Swampwalk
item.flavorText: Those who live amid decay must expect scavengers.

item.name: Bog Wraith
item.text: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
item.flavorText: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

item.name: Boiling Seas
item.text: Destroy all Islands.
item.flavorText: What burns the land, boils the seas.

item.name: Border Guard
item.flavorText: "Join the army, see foreign countries" they'd said.

item.name: Breath of Life
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.name: Bull Hippo
item.text: Islandwalk
item.flavorText: Stay alert: his lumbering may shake the ground itself, but in water, he glides.

item.name: Burning Cloak
item.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Burning Cloak deals 2 damage to that creature.

item.name: Capricious Sorcerer
item.text: {T}: Capricious Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

item.name: Charging Bandits
item.text: Whenever Charging Bandits attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: The fear in their victims' eyes is their most cherished reward.

item.name: Charging Paladin
item.text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: A true warrior's thoughts are of victory, not death.

item.name: Charging Rhino
item.text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.
item.flavorText: A rhino rarely uses its horn to announce its charge, only to end it.

item.name: Cloak of Feathers
item.text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: A thousand feathers from a thousand birds, sewn with magic and song.

item.name: Cloud Dragon
item.text: Flying Cloud Dragon can block only creatures with flying.

item.name: Cloud Pirates
item.text: Flying Cloud Pirates can block only creatures with flying.

item.name: Cloud Spirit
item.text: Flying Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

item.name: Command of Unsummoning
item.text: Cast Command of Unsummoning only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Return one or two target attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

item.name: Coral Eel
item.flavorText: Some fishers like to eat eels, and some eels like to eat fishers.

item.name: Craven Giant
item.text: Craven Giant can't block.
item.flavorText: "The best armor is to keep out of range." —Italian proverb

item.name: Craven Knight
item.text: Craven Knight can't block.
item.flavorText: "I say victory is better than honor."

item.name: Cruel Bargain
item.text: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

item.name: Cruel Fate
item.text: Look at the top five cards of target opponent's library. Put one of those cards into that player's graveyard, and the rest on top of his or her library in any order.

item.name: Cruel Tutor
item.text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
item.flavorText: The more you pay for the lesson, the better you'll remember it.

item.name: Deep Wood
item.text: Cast Deep Wood only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

item.name: Deep-Sea Serpent
item.text: Deep-Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
item.flavorText: Sailors fear the deep-sea serpent; others thank the gods it has no legs.

item.name: Defiant Stand
item.text: Cast Defiant Stand only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn. If that creature is tapped, untap it.

item.name: Déjà Vu
item.text: Return target sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: The past is a mirror of the future.

item.name: Desert Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Never doubt a dragon just because of its size.

item.name: Devastation
item.text: Destroy all creatures and lands.
item.flavorText: There is much talk about the art of creation. What about the art of destruction?

item.name: Devoted Hero
item.flavorText: The heart's courage is the soul's guardian.

item.name: Djinn of the Lamp
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Once they learn the trick of carrying their own lamps, they never touch the ground again.

item.name: Dread Charge
item.text: Until end of turn, black creatures you control can be blocked only by black creatures.
item.flavorText: "As equal were their souls, so equal was their fate."John Dryden, "Ode to Mrs. Anne Killigrew"

item.name: Dread Reaper
item.text: Flying When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

item.name: Dry Spell
item.text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
item.flavorText: A fist of dust to line your throat, a bowl of sand to fill your belly.

item.name: Earthquake
item.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

item.name: Ebon Dragon
item.text: Flying When Ebon Dragon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

item.name: Elite Cat Warrior
item.text: Forestwalk
item.flavorText: "Hear that? No? That's a cat warrior."

item.name: Elite Cat Warrior
item.text: Forestwalk
item.flavorText: "Hear that? No? That's a cat warrior."

item.name: Elven Cache
item.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: Elves know where to harvest the best of the forest, for they planted it themselves.

item.name: Elvish Ranger
item.flavorText: It's up to you if you enter their woods—and up to them if you leave.

item.name: Endless Cockroaches
item.text: When Endless Cockroaches is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Endless Cockroaches to its owner's hand.

item.name: Exhaustion
item.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

item.name: False Peace
item.text: Target player skips all combat phases of his or her next turn.
item.flavorText: Mutual consent is not required for war.

item.name: Feral Shadow
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Not all shadows are cast by light—some are cast by darkness.

item.name: Final Strike
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Final Strike, sacrifice a creature. Final Strike deals damage to target opponent equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

item.name: Fire Dragon
item.text: Flying When Fire Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.

item.name: Fire Imp
item.text: When Fire Imp enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

item.name: Fire Snake
item.text: When Fire Snake is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, destroy target land.
item.flavorText: The snake's final thrashings only spread the fire within it.

item.name: Fire Tempest
item.text: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

item.name: Flashfires
item.text: Destroy all Plains.
item.flavorText: Dry grass is tinder before the spark.

item.name: Fleet-Footed Monk
item.text: Fleet-Footed Monk can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater.
item.flavorText: "Hesitation is for the faithless. My belief lends me speed."

item.name: Flux
item.text: Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards. Draw a card.

item.name: Foot Soldiers
item.flavorText: Infantry deployment is the art of putting your troops in the wrong place at the right time.

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forest
item.text: G

item.name: Forked Lightning
item.text: Forked Lightning deals 4 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

item.name: Fruition
item.text: You gain 1 life for each Forest on the battlefield.
item.flavorText: Come to these woods and suffer no pain; you've burdens to lose and new life to gain.

item.name: Giant Octopus
item.flavorText: At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.

item.name: Giant Spider
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: It's not far into the trap, as the crow flies.

item.name: Gift of Estates
item.text: If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Goblin Bully
item.flavorText: It's easy to stand head and shoulders over those with no backbone.

item.name: Gorilla Warrior
item.flavorText: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

item.name: Gravedigger
item.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.name: Grizzly Bears
item.flavorText: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

item.name: Hand of Death
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
item.flavorText: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

item.name: Hand of Death
item.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
item.flavorText: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

item.name: Harsh Justice
item.text: Cast Harsh Justice only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. This turn, whenever an attacking creature deals combat damage to you, it deals that much damage to its controller.

item.name: Highland Giant
item.flavorText: Though slow-witted and slow-moving, they are quick to anger.

item.name: Hill Giant
item.flavorText: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot

item.name: Horned Turtle
item.flavorText: Its spear has no shaft, its shield no handle.

item.name: Howling Fury
item.text: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: I howl my soul to the moon, and the moon howls with me.

item.name: Hulking Cyclops
item.text: Hulking Cyclops can't block.
item.flavorText: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

item.name: Hulking Goblin
item.text: Hulking Goblin can't block.
item.flavorText: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

item.name: Hurricane
item.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

item.name: Ingenious Thief
item.text: Flying When Ingenious Thief enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand.

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Island
item.text: U

item.name: Jungle Lion
item.text: Jungle Lion can't block.
item.flavorText: The lion's only loyalty is to its hunger.

item.name: Keen-Eyed Archers
item.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: "If it has wings, shoot it. If it doesn't, shoot it anyway."

item.name: King's Assassin
item.text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
item.flavorText: Fear is as effective a weapon as the blade.

item.name: Knight Errant
item.flavorText: ". . . Before honor is humility." —The Bible, Proverbs 15:33

item.name: Last Chance
item.text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

item.name: Lava Axe
item.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.
item.flavorText: Swing your axe as a broom, to sweep away the foe.

item.name: Lava Flow
item.text: Destroy target creature or land.
item.flavorText: People ran as never before at the thought of being buried and cremated at the same time.

item.name: Lizard Warrior
item.flavorText: Don't let its appearance frighten you. Let its claws and teeth do that.

item.name: Man-o'-War
item.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.name: Mercenary Knight
item.text: When Mercenary Knight enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

item.name: Merfolk of the Pearl Trident
item.flavorText: Are merfolk humans with fins, or are humans merfolk with feet?

item.name: Mind Knives
item.text: Target opponent discards a card at random.
item.flavorText: To dodge the unerring knife, one must be free of thought.

item.name: Mind Rot
item.text: Target player discards two cards.

item.name: Minotaur Warrior
item.flavorText: The herd's patience, the stampede's fury.

item.name: Mobilize
item.text: Untap all creatures you control.
item.flavorText: A rested mind is the sharpest weapon.

item.name: Monstrous Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Some cats are born fighters; others need a little persuading.

item.name: Monstrous Growth
item.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Some cats are born fighters; others need a little persuading.

item.name: Moon Sprite
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "I am that merry wanderer of the night." —William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain
item.text: R

item.name: Mountain Goat
item.text: Mountainwalk
item.flavorText: Only the heroic and the mad follow mountain goat trails.

item.name: Muck Rats
item.flavorText: The difference between a nuisance and a threat is often merely a matter of numbers.

item.name: Mystic Denial
item.text: Counter target creature or sorcery spell.

item.name: Natural Order
item.text: As an additional cost to cast Natural Order, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Natural Spring
item.text: Target player gains 8 life.
item.flavorText: Though many have come to this place to wash their wounds, the water has never turned red.

item.name: Nature's Cloak
item.text: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn.

item.name: Nature's Lore
item.text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
item.flavorText: Nature's secrets can be read on every tree, every branch, every leaf.

item.name: Nature's Ruin
item.text: Destroy all green creatures.
item.flavorText: One chill blast—the exhalation of the grave.

item.name: Needle Storm
item.text: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

item.name: Noxious Toad
item.text: When Noxious Toad is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

item.name: Omen
item.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

item.name: Owl Familiar
item.text: Flying When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

item.name: Panther Warriors
item.flavorText: The dogs of war are nothing compared to the cats.

item.name: Path of Peace
item.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
item.flavorText: The soldier reaped the profits of peace.

item.name: Personal Tutor
item.text: Search your library for a sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

item.name: Phantom Warrior
item.text: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
item.flavorText: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

item.name: Pillaging Horde
item.text: When Pillaging Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plains
item.text: W

item.name: Plant Elemental
item.text: When Plant Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.

item.name: Primeval Force
item.text: When Primeval Force enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice three Forests.

item.name: Prosperity
item.text: Each player draws X cards.
item.flavorText: "Life can never be too good."

item.name: Pyroclasm
item.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
item.flavorText: Chaos does not choose its enemies.

item.name: Python
item.flavorText: What could it have swallowed to grow so large?

item.name: Raging Cougar
item.text: Haste
item.flavorText: Mountaineers quickly learn to travel with their spears always pointed up.

item.name: Raging Goblin
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: Charging alone takes uncommon daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

item.name: Raging Goblin
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
item.flavorText: Charging alone takes uncommon daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

item.name: Raging Minotaur
item.text: Haste
item.flavorText: The only thing worse than a minotaur with an axe is an angry minotaur with an axe.

item.name: Rain of Salt
item.text: Destroy two target lands.
item.flavorText: It pelts the land with its fury, spoiling what was once sweet.

item.name: Rain of Tears
item.text: Destroy target land.
item.flavorText: When emotions rain down, what rivers will be born?

item.name: Raise Dead
item.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
item.flavorText: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

item.name: Redwood Treefolk
item.flavorText: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.

item.name: Regal Unicorn
item.flavorText: Unicorns don't care if you believe in them any more than you care if they believe in you.

item.name: Renewing Dawn
item.text: You gain 2 life for each Mountain target opponent controls.
item.flavorText: Dawn brings a new day, and a new day brings hope.

item.name: Rowan Treefolk
item.flavorText: One of the forest's best protectors is the forest itself.

item.name: Sacred Knight
item.text: Sacred Knight can't be blocked by black and/or red creatures.
item.flavorText: "No flame, no horror can sway me from my cause."

item.name: Sacred Nectar
item.text: You gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: "For he on honey-dew hath fed, And drunk the milk of Paradise." —Samuel Taylor Coleridge, "Kubla Khan"

item.name: Scorching Spear
item.text: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

item.name: Scorching Winds
item.text: Cast Scorching Winds only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Scorching Winds deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

item.name: Seasoned Marshal
item.text: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.

item.name: Serpent Assassin
item.text: When Serpent Assassin enters the battlefield, you may destroy target nonblack creature.

item.name: Serpent Warrior
item.text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

item.name: Skeletal Crocodile
item.flavorText: The less flesh there is, the more teeth there seem to be.

item.name: Skeletal Snake
item.flavorText: They watched as the snake shed layer after layer until only cold bone remained.

item.name: Snapping Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: Drakes claim to be dragons—until the dragons show up.

item.name: Sorcerous Sight
item.text:
Look at target opponent's hand.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: Do not react; anticipate.

item.name: Soul Shred
item.text: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
item.flavorText: It would be a shame to let life slip away to nothing.

item.name: Spined Wurm
item.flavorText: It has more teeth than fit in its mouth.

item.name: Spiritual Guardian
item.text: When Spiritual Guardian enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: Hope is born within.

item.name: Spitting Earth
item.text: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.

item.name: Spotted Griffin
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: When the cat flies and the bird stalks, guard your horses carefully.

item.name: Stalking Tiger
item.text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.
item.flavorText: No one is happy when they notice a tiger.

item.name: Starlight
item.text: You gain 3 life for each black creature target opponent controls.
item.flavorText: Stars are like coins dropped into the night: their light buys safe passage.

item.name: Starlit Angel
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: To soar as high as hope, to dive as swift as justice.

item.name: Steadfastness
item.text: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Brute force wins the battles. Conviction wins the wars.

item.name: Stern Marshal
item.text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

item.name: Stone Rain
item.text: Destroy target land.
item.flavorText: I cast a thousand tiny suns— Beware my many dawns.

item.name: Storm Crow
item.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
item.flavorText: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

item.name: Summer Bloom
item.text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.
item.flavorText: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Swamp
item.text: B

item.name: Sylvan Tutor
item.text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

item.name: Symbol of Unsummoning
item.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
item.flavorText: ". . . inviting the soul to wander for a spell in abysses of solitude . . . ." —Kate Chopin, The Awakening

item.name: Taunt
item.text: During target player's next turn, creatures that player controls attack you if able.

item.name: Temporary Truce
item.text: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way, that player gains 2 life.

item.name: Theft of Dreams
item.text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
item.flavorText: Energy is never lost, only transformed.

item.name: Thing from the Deep
item.text: Whenever Thing from the Deep attacks, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice an Island.
item.flavorText: Seafarers fear sailing off the world's edge not so much as down its gullet.

item.name: Thundering Wurm
item.text: When Thundering Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.

item.name: Thundermare
item.text: Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.) When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

item.name: Tidal Surge
item.text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
item.flavorText: "'Twas when the seas were roaring With hollow blasts of wind . . . ." —John Gay, "The What D'Ye Call It"

item.name: Time Ebb
item.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
item.flavorText: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

item.name: Touch of Brilliance
item.text: Draw two cards.
item.flavorText: Acting on one good idea is better than hoarding all the world's knowledge.

item.name: Treetop Defense
item.text: Cast Treetop Defense only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step. Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn. (They can block creatures with flying.)

item.name: Undying Beast
item.text: When Undying Beast is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, put Undying Beast on top of its owner's library.

item.name: Untamed Wilds
item.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Valorous Charge
item.text: White creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: Stand in the way of truth at your peril.

item.name: Vampiric Feast
item.text: Vampiric Feast deals 4 damage to target creature or player and you gain 4 life.
item.flavorText: It's not always gold the thief is after.

item.name: Vampiric Touch
item.text: Vampiric Touch deals 2 damage to target opponent and you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: A touch, not comforting, but of death.

item.name: Venerable Monk
item.text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
item.flavorText: His presence brings not only a strong arm but also renewed hope.

item.name: Vengeance
item.text: Destroy target tapped creature.
item.flavorText: Bitter as wormwood, sweet as mulled wine.

item.name: Virtue's Ruin
item.text: Destroy all white creatures.
item.flavorText: All must fall, and those who stand highest fall hardest.

item.name: Volcanic Dragon
item.text: Flying, haste

item.name: Volcanic Hammer
item.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
item.flavorText: Cast the weight as though it were a die, to see a rival's fate.

item.name: Wall of Granite
item.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
item.flavorText: The wisest man builds his house behind the rock.

item.name: Wall of Swords
item.text: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
item.flavorText: Sharper than wind, lighter than air.

item.name: Warrior's Charge
item.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It is not the absence of fear that makes a warrior, but its domination.

item.name: Warrior's Charge
item.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
item.flavorText: It is not the absence of fear that makes a warrior, but its domination.

item.name: Whiptail Wurm
item.flavorText: It's hard to say for certain which end is more dangerous.

item.name: Wicked Pact
item.text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

item.name: Willow Dryad
item.text: Forestwalk
item.flavorText: Some think that dryads are the dreams of trees.

item.name: Wind Drake
item.text: Flying
item.flavorText: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."—William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

item.name: Winds of Change
item.text: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.

item.name: Winter's Grasp
item.text: Destroy target land.
item.flavorText: Winter settles on the land, and the land prays it will wake.

item.name: Withering Gaze
item.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.

item.name: Wood Elves
item.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.name: Wrath of God
item.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
item.flavorText: "As flies to wanton boys, are we to the gods. They kill us for their sport." —William Shakespeare, King Lear
